ygData.subject: RE: Zones zones Zones
ygData.msgSnippet: I hate what they ve done to Kithicor. I personally don t mind the mobs as a 50th, but I made the mistake of going afk at RV zone with my druid and someone
ygData.messageBody:
I hate what they've done to Kithicor. I personally don't mind the mobs as a
50th, but I made the mistake of going afk at RV zone with my druid and
someone trained 4 or 5 uber-skellies there. Luckily I got back in time to
zone. It's the location. They should've put these mobs somewhere else like
in Lesser Faydark. I feel sorry for halfling newbies that don't have friends


Lesser Faydark? You gotta be kidding, then Gnomes would have no way out of
Steamfont. That'd be far worse as Lesser Fay has always had 5-10 times as
many people in it as Kithicor. Not to mention there have always been some
undead in Kithicor so it fits the storyline far better there.

Kitasi
